verses.content: Mi pasie lungril ṭhaa fetu chu, A hmûrhaia khêlinhlipa mi invêt nêk chun a ṭha lem.
Lungril hrietthiemna bo khawm chu a ṭha chuong nawh a, Chun, a kehai tir inhmâwtu chun a suksuol hlak.
Mihriem invêtna chun a lampui chu a sukkâwi a, A lungril chu LALPA chungah a lungsen hlak.
Hausakna chun ruolhai tamtak a belsa a, Mi pasie ruok chu a ruola inthawka ṭhein a um.
Thuhretu indik naw chu hrem lo ni naw ni a, Thukhêl sâksuoktu chun pumpel bawk naw nih.
Mi tamtakin mi tiktlai ditsakna an ngên a, Mi tin chu thilthlâwnpêk petu ta dinga ruol a nih.
Mi pasie chu a unauhai po poin an theida a, A ruolhai lem chun ieng ang khieua hla am an fe san ding chu! Thuhaiin anni a hnawt pei a; nisienlakhawm, an fe hmang tah.
Varna hmutu chun ama lungril a hmangai a, Hrietthiemna vawngtu chun thil ṭha chu hmûng a tih.
Thuhretu indik naw chu hrem lo ni naw nih, Thukhêl sâksuoktu chu bohmang bawk a tih.
Inhawi chên hi invêt ta ding chun a âwm nawh a, Siehlaw ta dingin lal nauhai chunga rorêl chu a âwm naw nâwk zuol a nih.
Mihriem remruotthiemna hin ama chu lunginsen intak dingin a siem a, Bawsietna fe khêl chu ama ta dingin chawimawina a nih.
Lal lunginsenna chu sakeibak- nei inrûm ri ang a na, A ditsakna ruok chu hlohna chunga daidaw ang a nih.
Naupa invêt chu a pa lunginrimna a na, Nuhmei lungawinawna chu ruo sûr zing ang a nih.
In le hausaknahai hi thlatu- haia inthawka rochan an na, Nuhmei var ruok hi chu LALPAA inthawk a nih.
Thabona chu imu inhniktakah ân peilût a, Mi thabo chun phîngṭâm tuor a tih.
Thupêk vawngtu chun a lung- ril chu a vawng ṭha a na, A lampuihaia fîmkhur lo chu thîng a tih.
Mi pasie lunginsiettu chun LALPA ân pûktir a na, A thil thaw ṭha chu ama chun pe nâwk a tih.
Beiseina a la um laiin i naupa chu thunun la, A sietna ding êm chun lungril nei naw rawh.
Mi lunginsen êm êm mi chun hremna chu tuor a ta, Ama chu i sansuok chun, i sansuok nâwk pei a ṭûl ding a ni sih a.
Thurâwn chu ngai la, inchûktirna chu pawm rawh, I hihnung tâwp tienga i hung var theina dingin.
Mihriem lungrila chun remruotna tamtak a um a, Amiruokchu, LALPA thurâwn chau chu ngîrsuok a tih.
Mihriem nuom zâwng chu a lunginsietna inkhina a na, Mi pasie chu mi khêlhlip nêkin a ṭha lem.
LALPA ṭîna chun hringna ân tlun a, Chu chu neitu chu tlaitakin um a ta, Thil ṭha naw hrimin ama chu sir ngai naw nih.
Mi thabo chun thlênga chun a kut chu a phûm a, A baua hang thun takngiel khawm chu a pei nawh.
Hmusittu chu vaw la, mi mâwl chun var inchûk a tih, Hrietthiemna nei mi chu kâwk la, hrethiem a tih.
A pa suksetu chun a nu chu a hnawt hmang a na, Ama chu kâwkna le inzakna intlungtir hlaktu naupa chu a nih.
Ka naupa, hrietthiemna thuhaia inthawka pêthmangna ding chau a, Inchûktirnahai ngaithlâk hi tâwp san rawh.
Thuhretu hmangnabo chun rorêlna a nuisan a, Mi khawhlo bau chun suolna a lem.
Rorêlnahai hi hmusittuhai ta dinga buotsai an na, Vuoknahai hi invêt ruongzâng ta dingin.
